name: Bit Shifter

minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista Processor: 2.0GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 512MB OpenGL compatible Storage: 500 MB available space Additional Notes: Does not like low end AMD graphics-on-chip processors
